org.gearvrf

Class GVRPostEffectMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRHybridObject
      • org.gearvrf.GVRPostEffectMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, GVRShaderMaps

    public class GVRPostEffectMap
extends GVRHybridObject
implements GVRShaderMaps
    Name map for post effect shaders.

    A GVRPostEffect specifies a shader by id, and contains named values. These names are not necessarily the same as the names of the uniforms in the shader program: the methods of this class let you map names from materials to programs.

    Despite a somewhat narrower API, it fills much the same role as GVRMaterialMap.
